subject_terms_1:This pictorial journal is grey in colour and it does not look creased. The page on the left has a darker tone of grey as compared to the one on the right. The page spread depicts Japanese military activity in Malaya and Burma. There is an image of a map of Malaya and Singapore with Japanese flags scattered among its territories. There are kanji scripts on the pages.  news photographs invasions
